speaker: Smol Smol Yuri
text: Oh, hey Smol Yuri! What's up?

speaker: Smol Yuri
text: Not much, I just wanted to say hi.

speaker: Smol Smol Yuri
text: Oh, okay. Well, if you need any advice later, feel free to ask.

speaker: Smol Smol Yuri
text: I know many random facts, some of which are actually useful.

speaker: Smol Yuri
text: I'll be sure to keep that in mind next time I see you!
